name: politico
text: The drugmaker Gilead will charge $390 per vial for its coronavirus treatment remdesivir — but only until September, when the price will increase by 33 percent https://t.co/uFBGSWQpLU

name: politico
text: Gilead is expected to make about $1.3 billion from the Covid-19 treatment in 2020. The drugmaker has said it spent about $1 billion to develop remdesivir. https://t.co/uFBGSWQpLU

name: politico
text: The U.S. government has purchased enough of the antiviral drug to treat more than 500,000 patients in hospitals through September, HHS said https://t.co/uFBGSWQpLU

name: politico
text: Remdesivir has not yet been shown to reduce Covid-19 deaths https://t.co/uFBGSWQpLU
